summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent in New York to an unspecified recipient, providing an overview and attaching two indictments related to the Epstein/Maxwell case. The email offers additional information if needed.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is providing case documents (indictments and an overview) related to the Epstein/Maxwell investigation from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 21, 2021, from an FBI Special Agent.
The email transmits two indictments related to the Epstein/Maxwell case: 'Maxwellindictment_20_Cr_330_-_signed_&_stamped.pdf' and 'Maxwell_52_Indictment_FINAL.pdf'.
The FBI agent works at the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk in the New York Field Office.
The email includes an overview document titled 'US_v_GM_Summary.docx'.
The agent offers to provide additional information upon request.
